byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Institutional Shareholder Services recommended that shareholders reject 13 of the company’s 15 directors, including Rupert Murdoch.
snippet: Institutional Shareholder Services recommended that shareholders reject 13 of the company’s 15 directors, including Rupert Murdoch.

headline.main: Advisory Firm Urges Ouster of Murdoch and His Sons
headline.print_headline: Advisory Firm Urges Ouster Of Murdoch and His Sons
